name: mediaInputSource_setValue
description: This function is used to change the input source of a TV or monitor.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to change the input source.

parameters.name: mediaInputSource
parameters.description: The new input source to set.
